sentences.en: ‘Do you think he’ll come back?’ ‘Maybe.’
sentences.cn: “你认为他会回来吗？”“也许会吧。”

sentences.en: "Is she coming back?" — "Maybe. No one hears from her."
sentences.cn: “她快回来了吗？”——“也许吧。都还没信儿呢。”

sentences.en: "Maybe we could celebrate tonight." — "What did you have in mind?"
sentences.cn: “也许今晚我们可以庆祝一下。”——“你有何打算？”

sentences.en: He had maybe a thousand tapes, all neatly labelled and catalogued.
sentences.cn: 他大约有1,000盒磁带，都整齐地贴着标签并分了类。

sentences.en: He said he’d finish the work soon – maybe tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他说他很快就会完成那项工作——也许是明天。

sentences.en: I think I can play maybe for a couple more years.
sentences.cn: 我想也许我还能再打两年球。

sentences.en: Maybe he's trying to cool off out there in the rain.
sentences.cn: 可能他是想在雨里凉快一下。

sentences.en: Maybe I eat too much and that's what makes me dozy.
sentences.cn: 也许我吃得太多了，所以昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: Maybe if we could go someplace together, just you and I.
sentences.cn: 也许我们可以一起去某个地方，就我和你。

sentences.en: Maybe if you tell me a little about her?
sentences.cn: 也许你可以跟我讲一点关于她的事情？

sentences.en: Maybe it’s all just a big misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 也许这只是一个很大的误会。

sentences.en: Maybe there is jealousy, but I think the envy is more powerful.
sentences.cn: 也许是羡慕，但我认为更多的是嫉妒。

sentences.en: Maybe they’re right, but maybe not .
sentences.cn: 也许他们是对的，但也许不是。

sentences.en: Maybe this guy isn't so squeaky clean after all.
sentences.cn: 也许这个人说到底品行并非那么完美。

sentences.en: Maybe you had visions of being surrounded by happy, smiling children.
sentences.cn: 也许你曾幻想过被快乐嬉笑的孩子所包围的情景。

sentences.en: Maybe you'd better tell me what this is all about.
sentences.cn: 也许你应该告诉我这究竟是怎么回事。

sentences.en: People are still hanging out drinking beer, maybe shooting some pool.
sentences.cn: 人们仍聚在那里喝啤酒，可能还会打会儿台球。

sentences.en: The men were maybe a hundred feet away and coming closer.
sentences.cn: 那些人大约有100英尺远，正在向这里靠近。

sentences.en: Well, maybe it would be easier to start with a smaller problem.
sentences.cn: 那么，也许从小问题入手会更容易些。

sentences.en: well, that's as maybe but it's not the way the BBC works.
sentences.cn: 唔，就算那样，但这并不是英国广播公司的运作方式。

sentences.en: You have talent, maybe even genius.
sentences.cn: 你很有才能，甚至可以说有天赋。

trans.tran_en: used to say that something may happen or may be true but you are not certain
